Package jp.co.warehouse.dao.user

Class UserLoginDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.co.warehouse.dao.utility.DAOBase
      • jp.co.warehouse.dao.user.UserLoginDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoginStrategy
    public class UserLoginDAO
extends DAOBase
implements LoginStrategy
    This class is controlling the database access about setting, updating and adding login information.

    H.Maki

                                     java.lang.String password_old)
                              throws DatabaseException,
                                     SystemException
        If the user wish to change the password, before starting the process the user is tested by typing old password, and determined he is genuine.
        Specified by:
        checkMatchOldPassword in interface LoginStrategy
        Parameters:
        encryptedId_user - is the E-mail address of the user who wish to change the password.
        password_old - is the old password which is used before.
        Returns:
        it tells existing password is right.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - If the DB connection is fail.

      • checkMatchOldIdByUser

        public boolean checkMatchOldIdByUser​(java.lang.String encryptedPassword,
                                     java.lang.String id_old)
                              throws DatabaseException,
                                     SystemException
        If the user wish to change the E-mail as the ID, before starting the process the user is testified by typing old mail address and password, and determined he is genuine.
        Parameters:
        encryptedPassword - is the password to check the user is genuin.
        id_old - is the E-mail address of which the user has used before.
        Returns:
        The user is genuin or not.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - If the DB connection is fail.
        SystemException
        java.sql.SQLException - If the DB connection is fail.
